thread.title: BRIEF-Rave Restaurant Group Reports Q3 Loss Per Share Of $0.03

title: BRIEF-Rave Restaurant Group Reports Q3 Loss Per Share Of $0.03
text:
May 9, 2018 / 10:11 AM / in a minute BRIEF-Rave Restaurant Group Reports Q3 Loss Per Share Of $0.03 Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Rave Restaurant Group Inc:
* RAVE RESTAURANT GROUP, INC. REPORTS THIRD FISCAL QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* QTRLY TOTAL CONSOLIDATED REVENUE DECREASED 59.0% TO $2.7 MILLION COMPARED TO $6.5 MILLION IN Q3 OF FISCAL 2017 * Q3 LOSS PER SHARE $0.03
* RAVE RESTAURANT - COMPARABLE STORE RETAIL SALES DECREASED BY 12.6% FOR THE MOST RECENT FISCAL QUARTER COMPARED TO THE SAME PERIOD IN THE PRIOR YEAR Source text: [ bit.ly/2FZjuha ] Further company coverage:
